content:
# I have successfully moved to the center position of the coal resource patch. 
# Now, I will attempt to place the Stone Furnace at this location.

# Step 15: Place the Stone Furnace at the coal resource patch
furnace = place_entity(Prototype.StoneFurnace, position=Position(x=14.75, y=-10.25))  # Place the furnace at the coal resource patch.
print(f"Placed Stone Furnace at {Position(x=14.75, y=-10.25)}.")  # Output the placement information.
